## Description {#details}

Parser for the MSVC specific preprocessor directives.

<a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/preprocessor/comment-c-cpp?view=msvc-160">https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/preprocessor/comment-c-cpp?view=msvc-160</a>
